globalProperty.description: When set to true, the debezium engine will be started otherwise it will not be started
A required property that specifies the unique id of the database server.
A required MySQL specific property that specifies the path to a file where the database history is stored
A required path to file where offsets are to be stored

An optional MySQL specific property that controls whether and how long the connector holds the global MySQL read lock, which prevents any updates to the database, while the connector is performing a snapshot, Possible settings are: minimal, minimal_percona, extended, none. The default is extended, for more detailed explanations of these values please refer to the official debezium documentation for the MySQL connector.

An optional MySQL specific property that specifies whether to use an encrypted connection. Possible settings are: disabled, preferred, required, verify_ca, verify_identity. The default is preferred, for more detailed explanations of these values please refer to the official debezium documentation for the MySQL connector.
Specifies the default value to be returned by the services
Specifies the applications names and the desirable tables to be watch and shared with the application Ex: PDS: person, person_name,...;MPI: person, person_name, ...
